page.title: 11DAY CARE CENTRE S.SHIELDS
page.content: There is a Day Care Centre in Gainsborough Avenue, near our school.It is an old people's club,run by the Social Service Department.It has 100 members, most of whom attend for two sessions each week.It opens at 7am and closes at 3pm,but it also has 2 evening sessions which are run by the members themselves. Most off the old people pay 55p and have their lunch there.The cook is not allowed to use convenience foods, everything must be fresh.Some of the men come in everyday for lunch, because they do not know how to cook for themselves. After lunch, the old people play 5 or 10 or 15 games of bingo.They love it. The centre tries to provide a variety of activities,such as darts, dancing, whistand handicrafts.They even go on holiday 3 times a year.
